channel.title: pdftools on Redwall Analytics Blogsite
channel.description: Recent content in pdftools on Redwall Analytics Blogsite

item.title: Tabulizer and pdftools R Libraries as Super-powers - Part II
item.description: Introduction This post will be a continuation of Parsing of Mass Municipal PDF CAFR’s with Tabulizer, pdftools and AWS Textract - Part 1 dealing with extracting data from PDFs using R. When Redwall discovered pdftools, and its pdf_data function, which maps out every word on a pdf page by x-y coordinate, we thought that was interesting, but didn’t really know how to use it.
